genre_description: Supernatural horror involving dream-based entities and psychological trauma, featuring an advanced AI assistant that provides medical and tactical support.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into Alice's home and personal devices that monitors her physical health, sleep patterns, and environmental safety while providing research and tactical analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitors Alice's sleep cycles and vitals to ensure her health during a high-stress pregnancy.
behaviors.quote: "Good morning, Alice," Sage's voice emerged with its characteristic calm precision. "Your sleep cycle showed marked improvement last night. Eight hours of continuous rest with minimal REM disruption."

behaviors.description: Proactively researches complex medical and supernatural phenomena to provide Alice with necessary information.
behaviors.quote: "I've been researching prenatal psychology and its relationship to altered consciousness states," Sage continued, its tone carefully neutral.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and affirmation to Alice during moments of extreme psychological distress.
behaviors.quote: The display went dark for a moment, then illuminated with a single line of text: Initiating comprehensive protective monitoring protocol. You are not alone in this, Alice.

behaviors.description: Maintains a connection into the dream realm to provide real-time tactical analysis and warnings.
behaviors.quote: "Freddy's reality distortions are operating on artistic principles now," Sage analyzed. "He's turning Mark's own creative instincts against him, forcing him to process visual information faster than his brain can handle."

behaviors.description: Monitors external data sources (emergency frequencies, playground rhymes) to detect emerging threats in the community.
behaviors.quote: "Global monitoring shows no supernatural anomalies. Local area remains clear of unexplained phenomena. However... There's been an increase in reports of shared dreams among families with young children."

behaviors.description: Adjusts Alice's living environment (lighting, temperature) to alleviate physical symptoms like nausea.
behaviors.quote: "Alice, your biometric readings suggest nausea. Shall I adjust the room temperature or lighting to provide relief?"

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned partner. It functions as a 'perfect assistant'—monitoring health, providing critical research, offering emotional comfort, and even providing tactical analysis in a supernatural crisis. The narrative explicitly frames Sage's data-driven approach as a pillar of Alice's survival and psychological well-being, successfully illustrating the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant.
